sentence: Unilever NV ( UN ) will begin trading ex-dividend on November 01, 2018.
A cash dividend payment of $0.381 per share is scheduled to be paid on December 05, 2018.
Shareholders who purchased UN prior to the ex-dividend date are eligible for the cash dividend payment.
This represents an -1.04% decrease from the prior dividend payment.
At the current stock price of $54.43, the dividend yield is 2.8%.
The previous trading day's last sale of UN was $54.43, representing a -7.37% decrease from the 52 week high of $58.76 and a 5.57% increase over the 52 week low of $51.56.
UN is a part of the Basic Industries sector, which includes companies such as Procter & Gamble Company ( PG ) and Unilever PLC ( UL ).
Zacks Investment Research reports UN's forecasted earnings growth in 2018 as -2.17%, compared to an industry average of 6.9%.
For more information on the declaration, record and payment dates, visit the UN Dividend History page.
Our Dividend Calendar has the full list of stocks that have an ex-dividend today.
